title: So i really want to work for riot
body: Im currently not 18 yet and its been my dream ever since i was a boy to work at riot but is it a li ited field and do we have a riot hq in australia

replies.body:
It's pretty competitive to get in and work for Riot, but they do have a Sydney office. You can keep up to date with open positions [HERE](https://www.riotgames.com/en/work-with-us/offices/sydney#job-list).

You can also spend a bit on the site to read about what kind of skills you would need to land a position.
Yes but i am currently under the age of 18 would i be able to find a position there anyway

Probably not no. To work for Riot you would likely need a skill set that is unique/ has been refined to a point you stand out. 
I'd guess mid-late 20s+
As far as I am aware only the main NA site does that and the college/high school experience programmes
Rise to the top and save us all friend
Why? Riot's a trash company with no morals and a workforce as well versed as their game. Not at all.

I've been coding since the late 80's/early 90's (BASIC), I know game balance from decades of MtG (I would win local create-a-card contests all the time), I beta test games and get entire patches made just on my feedback (PoE). I probably couldn't even get a job with Riot.

Good luck bro.
